Missing gene names in all.chr.table at exonic positions
=========================================================

```{r comment=NA, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
load("/raid/genevol/1kg/r_objects/all.chr.table.RData")

all_chr_tbl <- tbl_df(all.chr.table)

all_chr_tbl %>% 
  filter(general_func == "exonic", !is.na(general_func), is.na(gene)) %>% 
  select(ID, POS, CHR, gene, general_func, exonic_func)
```
